Jogo que jogo desde a versão 1.6, quando ainda comprava o CD numa loja e instalava no PC, antes mesmo da Steam. É um jogo diferente demais, porque é jogável em quase todo PC menos robusto com qualidade razoável. Não é um jogo de efeitos bonitos, mas, de agilidade, estratégia e habilidade. Ter mais frames na tela vale mais que ter efeitos visuais bonitos, como COD, Battlefield ou Wolfenstein Youngblood, por exemplo.

Very good game, but the nonexsistent anticheat a.k.a. VAC ruins it.
Its kinda frustrating to see someone, who even shows his hacks on stream, getting no ban at all since months.

Totally ruins any fun and it seems like Valve doesn't care at all.
Cheio de hack mas e bom

Stupid fucking game, I spent almost 1500 hours and somehow I had almost no fun, just stress and punches in the keyboard, i was LEM and I won 9 consecutive games, lost 1, then won another 3 then I got deranked form 1 loss. so baisiclly is a stupid shooter with very bad mechanics and I dont see  a reason  to play this game when there are all the other shooters and almost any game is more fun than this stupid shit!
El juego es muy real porque tenes que escuchar los pasos,elegir armas de acuerdo al momento  y tener tacticas muy bueno la verdad que para pasar el rato con amigos o solo es divertido.

It is too easy to cheat in this game unless you plan on using a third party application like ESEA it is not fun at all... even in casual people just cheat for fun and don't hide it. Tracing you through walls and while full flashed. It is not a good time. It gives you the same feeling as Tarkov but instead of coming out on top with a bunch of loot. You just wasted an hour of your life playing a comp match with a cheater and at the end he tells you he is cheating. 
   So... that being said, if you love to cheat in games, THIS is the game for you. Super easy to cheat and in the casual game mode the "Report" function in fact, does not function.

Until it became totally free, you can't play a single casual game without a damned cheater. They system might be pretty cool at studying out these situations and find hackers faster, but it still taking away the enjoy of the game. They also gathering more money from more expensive case keys, it also shows that it shouldn't needed to let it be free...
As the number 1 ranked player in Counterstrike: Global Offensive, I can wholeheartedly recommend it to everyone.  It has a little bit of something for everyone.
great game, always improving and giving the community what they want
